thread.title: Kimmel Reminds Oscars: Be Political, Trump Will Tweet About It in His Morning Bowel Movement
thread.title_full: Kimmel Reminds Oscars: Be Political, Trump Will Tweet About It in His Morning Bowel Movement

author: Ken Meyer
title: Kimmel Reminds Oscars: Be Political, Trump Will Tweet About It in His Morning Bowel Movement
text:
Kimmel Reminds Oscars: Be Political, Trump Will Tweet About It in His Morning Bowel Movement by Ken Meyer | 9:04   
Jimmy Kimmel opened the Oscars with a slew of jokes about Donald Trump , and he concluded his monologue by reminding tonight’s nominees that any one of them could be the next person to earn an angry tweet from the president. 
Kimmel’s Trump jokes touched on everything from a #OscarsSoWhite throwback, to a bit about the “overrated” Meryl Streep . As he concluded his set, Kimmel told the applauding audience to remember that if they take a shot at Trump on stage tonight, they Commander in Chief will more than likely tweet about it first thing in the morning. 
“We’re at the Oscars. The Academy Awards. You’re nominated. You got to come. Your families are nominated.some of you will get to come up here on this stage tonight and give a speech that the President of the United States will tweet about in all caps during his 5:00 A.M. bowel movement tomorrow, and I think that’s pretty darn excellent if you ask me.” 
Watch above, via ABC.
